import React, {useRef} from 'react' import SlickSlider from 'react-slick' import {IconButton} from '@material-ui/core' import {ArrowLeft, ArrowRight} from '@material-ui/icons' import {useStyles} from './useStyle' import {settings} from './sliderSettings' const MainSlider = () => { const slider = useRef({current: null}); const next = () => slider.current.slickNext(); const previous = () => slider.current.slickPrev(); const classes = useStyles(); return (
) } export default MainSlider;
